name: Do The Same for COLECOVISION
description:
My second puzzle game for Colecovision. 

Need to optimize some things.
This version contains only the first level (16 stages) and the webscore code is not present.
There are many jingles, sfx and 2 great musics (menu and game)

The final version contains the 112 originals atari jaguar version stages

Last work was to put musics (Menu + inGame + Jingles & Sfx)

For a better music experience, please switch to 50hz :)

IMPORTANT NOTE

This game is using Megacart process, it's a 64kb game. You have to use BLUEMSX emulator to play with DTS
Open it, 'insert  cartridge in port1' by clicking only one time on the rom name and in 'Rom type', you choose Megacart then OPEN

GOAL

You have to reproduce a 'picture' by rotating a four squares tileset
You can win an EXTRA LIFE every 300pts and you can save your score on the net by using your webscorecode  on http://ricco59em.free.fr/dts/  

Be fast, be the best
Enjoy!

CONTROLS

STICK to move your cursor
LEFT FIRE or RIGHT FIRE to rotate the tileset clockwise or anti-clockwise
# key to RESTART stage with -20pts
* key to QUIT game

CREDITS

LUDO - Great GFX
TOBIKOMI - Great musics, jingles and SFX
Eric 'Ricco59' Mendel - Code & Music Conversion

Additionnal Credits

Amy Bienvenu for its Coleco Devkit and Friends for their supports
